mapper.select: SELECT user_id, mobile_number, email, authenticator_id, is_verified FROM user WHERE email = #{email} and mobile_number = #{mobile}
SELECT user_id, mobile_number, email, authenticator_id, is_verified FROM user WHERE email = #{email} and is_verified = 1
SELECT password FROM user WHERE email = #{email} and mobile_number = #{mobile}

SELECT u.user_id, u.mobile_number, u.email, c.has_user_confirmed, (u.user_id = (SELECT group_leader FROM registration_group_for_event WHERE group_id = #{group_id})) AS is_group_leader FROM confirmation_group_for_event c INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.group_id=#{group_id}
SELECT user_id FROM user_email_verification WHERE verification_token = #{token} AND expiryDate > #{date_time};
